html:
** Shares of daily deals platform GRPN.O up 1.64% at $21 premarket after co appoints new CEO

** Kedar Deshpande, former CEO of online shoes and clothing retailer Zappos, will join GRPN on Dec. 10 and interim CEO Aaron Cooper will step down - GRPN

** Deshpande spent more than 10 years at Zappos and worked at General Electric Co GE.N prior to that

** Up to Tuesday's close, GRPN down ~45.62% YTD


(Reporting by Sohini Podder in Bengaluru)

(( sohini.podder@thomsonreuters.com ))
